head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MANGANELLA, CARMEN KELLY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MANGANELLA, CARMEN KELLY

block.p: MANGANELLA-Carmen Kelly. On September 25, 2000. Treasured spouse of Richard, loving mother of JoAnna, adoring grandmother of Thomas and Timothy, beloved sister of Beverly, Mary and Sylvia, devoted daughter of Doris. Our hearts are breaking with the suddenness and shock of losing you. We will always hear your voice, see your face and cherish the love we shared. Reposing at HorneDanneker Funeral Home, 336 W. 23 St 212-242-5250 on Wednesday and Thursday. Funeral Mass on Friday morning.
